column7: Critical and analytical study of vocal ensemble and choral music from the Middle Ages to the present. 2 graduate hours. No professional credit. May be repeated in separate terms to a maximum of 8 hours. Prerequisite: MM and DMA in choral conducting students, or consent of instructor.
